entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is able to use magic and summon brooms.

entities.name: Rosmerta
entities.description: A person who owns a pub and has brooms that can be summoned by Harry.

entities.name: the Ministry
entities.description: An organization that is mentioned as needing to receive a message from Rosmerta.

entities.name: brooms
entities.description: Magical objects that can be summoned by Harry and are owned by Rosmerta.

relationships.description: Harry is able to summon Rosmerta's brooms using the spell 'Accio'.
Rosmerta is instructed by Harry to send a message to the Ministry.
